motivational.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivational.author: Steve Jobs

motivational.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
motivational.author: Winston Churchill

motivational.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
motivational.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivational.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
motivational.author: Aristotle

feelGood.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
feelGood.author: Dalai Lama

feelGood.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
feelGood.author: Chinese Proverb

feelGood.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
feelGood.author: Confucius

emotional.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
emotional.author: Helen Keller

emotional.text: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
emotional.author: David Viscott

emotional.text: The heart has its reasons which reason knows not.
emotional.author: Blaise Pascal

calm.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
calm.author: Buddha

calm.text: In the midst of movement and chaos, keep stillness inside of you.
calm.author: Deepak Chopra

calm.text: Silence is not empty, it is full of answers.
calm.author: Unknown
